hanzi-su-wiki:
戦

Значения

Воевать, сражаться; война; бунт

Мнемоника

  • Вилы 単 — оружие повстанцев, а копьё 戈 — солдат.

  • "Разные оружия используются в сражении."

Варианты

戰, 战

zhàn
Japanese variant of 战
Японский вариант войны
rtega_mnemonic:
戦戦RSwar, fighting, battle
  • a single 単 individual carrying a spear 戈 going into battle
戰
heisig_constituent: war, simple, owl, rice field, brains, ten, needle, fiesta
koohiiStory1: George W. Bush´s plans for war were so SIMPLE. To him, its all just a big FIESTA.
koohiiStory2: So there´s this fiesta in downtown Compton. It´s a simple party, but someone invited people from the wrong gangs and the simple fiesta turns into an all-out turf war.
kunYomi: いくさ、たたか.う、おのの.く、そよぐ、わなな.く
jp_example_words:
戦(いくさ): war, battle, campaign, fight
休戦(きゅうせん): truce, armistice
作戦(さくせん): military or naval operations, tactics, strategy
戦災(せんさい): war damage
戦術(せんじゅつ): tactics
戦闘(せんとう): battle, fight, combat
戦力(せんりょく): war potential
挑戦(ちょうせん): challenge, defiance
敗戦(はいせん): defeat, losing a war
大戦(たいせん): great war, great battle
戦い(たたかい): battle, fight, struggle, conflict
戦う(たたかう): to fight, battle, combat, struggle against, wage war, engage in contest
戦争(せんそう): war
jp_readingExamples: 戦 (いくさ), 戦う (たたか.う)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Even a simple drunkard can start a war. In fact, it's really common for one simple drunk person to offend an entire country into declaring war.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Think about all of the people you know. You can picture at least one of them getting drunk and, I dunno, sending out a simple drunk tweet that starts the next world war. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Welp, you woke up this morning and now you're at war with the centaurs (せん). This is especially unfortunate, because the centaurs are really good at battles because they're all automatically cavalry troops.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine the war of humans vs centaurs. Do you really think the humans will win? Centaurs are really powerful and they have all of the same high tech weapons as us AND horse legs.
Ru_Radicals: 十 (десять), 尚 (ещё), 戈 (копьё), 田 (рисовое поле)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a simple (単) spear (戈) lets you do battle

zhàn
яп., вм. 战

戦

Значения

Воевать, сражаться; война; бунт

Мнемоника

  • Вилы 単 — оружие повстанцев, а копьё 戈 — солдат.

  • "Разные оружия используются в сражении."

Варианты

戰, 战

Radicals: 単, 戈  (simple, drunkard)
Meaning Mnemonic
Even a simple drunkard can start a war. In fact, it's really common for one simple drunk person to offend an entire country into declaring war.
Think about all of the people you know. You can picture at least one of them getting drunk and, I dunno, sending out a simple drunk tweet that starts the next world war. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
Reading Mnemonic
Welp, you woke up this morning and now you're at war with the centaurs (せん). This is especially unfortunate, because the centaurs are really good at battles because they're all automatically cavalry troops.
Imagine the war of humans vs centaurs. Do you really think the humans will win? Centaurs are really powerful and they have all of the same high tech weapons as us AND horse legs.
